      • onConnecting

        void onConnecting(RCConnection connection)

        Parameters:

      • onConnected

        void onConnected(RCConnection connection,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHeaders)
        Connection just connected. This can be either an incoming or outgoing connection
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection
        customHeaders - Custom SIP headers from Restcomm. Applicable only in outbound calls -for incoming calls customHeaders are found at the incoming call Intent

      • onDisconnected

      • onLocalVideo

        void onLocalVideo(RCConnection connection)
        Local webrtc video is received (i.e. video stream from the local camera). If user hasn't used video for the call then this event doens't occur
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection

      • onRemoteVideo

        void onRemoteVideo(RCConnection connection)
        Remote webrtc video is received (i.e. video stream from the peer's camera). If peers hasn't used video for the call then this event doens't occur *
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection
